title: Partenariat
text: Having closely followed the establishment of the Euro-Mediterranean partnership, the initiators of the EMHRN felt that this structure had a potential to have a positive impact on human rights in the region. The EU maintains diplomatic relations with most countries of the world. It has not only forged strategic partnerships with major international players, but is also fully engaged in cooperation with emerging powers around the world and has signed bilateral association agreements with a number of neighboring states.
